column1: Little Goat Diner////From what I"ve heard
column2: this place is always just as packed. Luckily
column3: me and a couple friends had a Tuesday afternoon off so when we got there
column4: we were seated right away. The menu is little overwelming
column6: you want to eat every single thing on it. They also have a pretty good beer selection if you into the being a beer snob thing.
